Feature.Name: Mind Thrust
Feature.Text: As an action, you target one creature you can see within 120 feet of you. The target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw or take 1d10 psychic damage. The talentâ€™s damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).
